Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Weimar, Comfort Hotel Weimar is close to Congress Centre Neue Weimarhalle and Bauhaus Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of German National Theatre and Schiller House.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Located in Weimar, Comfort Hotel Weimar is close to Congress Centre Neue Weimarhalle and Bauhaus Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of German National Theatre and Schiller House.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Congress Centre Neue Weimarhalle - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Bauhaus Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
German National Theatre - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Schiller House - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Goethe House - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Buchenwald Concentration Camp - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Belvedere Castle - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Avenida Water Park - 17.9 km / 11.2 mi
Zeiss Planetarium - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi
Angermuseum - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi
Kramerbrucke - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi
Erfurt Cathedral - 21.9 km / 13.6 mi
Toskana Therme - 22.6 km / 14 mi
Dornburger Castle - 23.4 km / 14.5 mi
Egapark Erfurt - 24.1 km / 15 mi

The preferred airport for Comfort Hotel Weimar is Erfurt (ERF) - 26.2 km / 16.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
